Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Belmont
ShortDescription:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are standing at Belmont due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

  • Shuttle buses are requested from Kimball to Fullerton to provide connecting service in both directions.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
